name: Pulse
summary: Mel, a renowned heart surgeon, lives a carefree life with sex being a tool for joy rather than a show of affection. Then she meets someone that turns her view of love and life upside down. This story is about two people that meet with minimal expectations but soon become enthralled in a relationship that changes everything about themselves.
info:
• 中文名: 心跳
  • 出版社: Lezhin Comics
  • 别名: 펄스
  • 别名: パルス〜鼓動が聞こえ始める〜
  • 连载杂志: Lezhin Comics
  • 作者: Ratana Satis(泰国)
